meanings.sent1: The ochry walls of the old house gave it a warm and cozy feel.
meanings.sent2: Her ochry dress matched perfectly with the autumn leaves.
meanings.sent3: The ochry paint on the fence made it look like a giant banana!
meanings.sent4: The ochry sky at sunset painted the whole town in a golden hue.
meanings.sent5: The ochry sand on the beach sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Covered or tinged with a pale yellowish color.
meanings.sent1: The ochry leaves on the trees signaled the arrival of fall.
meanings.sent2: The ochry fields stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent3: The ochry flowers in the garden looked like little drops of sunshine.
meanings.sent4: Her ochry hair flowed like a river of gold in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The ochry feathers of the bird shimmered in the morning light.
